Design-Centric Career Fair

January 15th, 2019 - PC East Ballroom

The traditional career fair format doesn’t help students seeking design roles. Designers need a medium to showcase their work and experience. At Stride, students have the opportunity to showcase their projects and their portfolios versus handing off their resumes to recruiters.

Made with ♥ by Design at UCSD
